name: Semiconductor Manufacturing
description: Sector template for semiconductor manufacturing patents including wafer processing, CMP, and fab processes.
contextDescription: Semiconductor manufacturing patents cover fab processes and equipment. Key areas include wafer processing, CMP (Chemical Mechanical Planarization), deposition, etching, and metrology. High-value targets include foundries (TSMC, Samsung, Intel), equipment vendors (ASML, Applied Materials, Lam Research, KLA), and materials suppliers.
scoringGuidance: Process patents may be essential for specific technology nodes.
Equipment patents target ASML, Applied Materials, Lam Research, KLA.
CMP patents are essential for planarization in advanced nodes.
Metrology patents enable process control and yield improvement.
Consider both equipment and process integration patents.

questions.question: What manufacturing process step does this patent cover? Score based on criticality: 1-3 for auxiliary, 4-6 for standard steps, 7-10 for critical bottleneck steps.
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the manufacturing step and its criticality.

questions.question: Does this patent target equipment vendors (ASML, Applied Materials, Lam, KLA)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify specific equipment vendors that would implement this.

questions.question: Is this patent relevant to foundry processes (TSMC, Samsung Foundry, Intel Foundry)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Assess foundry applicability and process node relevance.
